relation: M

30 "Star-Spangled Sundown" PaintScaping Show June 30, 2014 8:00 pm In the evenings from May 23 – July 5, 2014, Resort guests and locals alike can enjoy The Westin Kierland's newest tradition, PaintScaping, in which themed 3D images and animations are projected across the Resort’s 11-story main building and set to music. The art of "PaintScaping," derived from painting the landscape, merges a virtual world with the existing world by projecting 3-dimensional digital mapping onto buildings that act as the canvas for characters, colors, and objects as living and moving parts of the façade. This summer the PaintScaping show, titled "Star-Spangled Sundown" will feature all-American imagery paired with patriotic music. Held at 8 p.m., 8:30 p.m., 9 p.m. and 9:30 p.m. nightly, the Star-Spangled Sundown PaintScaping show is free and open to the public. "Star-Spangled Sundown" PaintScaping Show iCal Send "Star-Spangled Sundown" PaintScaping Show to Google Calendar "Star-Spangled Sundown" PaintScaping Show

4 Aloha Summer Pool Party July 4, 2014 6:00 pm On Friday evenings, guests can enjoy live musical entertainment and the return of the Resort's popular Food Truck Fridays. On Saturday evenings, the Resort will feature entertainment provided by the Resort's own summer DJ and the Aloha Summer Barbecue served poolside featuring Pulled Luau Pork sandwiches with Grilled Pineapple and Mango Salsa and Sweet Chili Garlic Sauce on a Hawaiian Bun and served with Hawaiian Potato Chips. 5 Kids in the Kitchen July 5, 2014 9:00 am – 10:30 am Kids in the Kitchen Kids don "Chef Whites" and take direction from the culinary staff as part of an interactive cooking program. Designed for children between the ages 5-12, the 90 minute program covers all areas of the culinary process from start to finish. $35 per child and space is limited! iCal Send Kids in the Kitchen to Google Calendar Kids in the Kitchen Phoenix Zoo July 5, 2014 11:00 am – 12:00 pm Guests of all ages will enjoy a 60 minute, interactive program where guests are introduced to the animal life of the desert. We will host Lego building competitions, Lego games, and Lego car racing competition. Best part - each kid will get to take home a 3 in 1 LEGO creator! Reservations are required, $20 per child. 6 Princess Party July 6, 2014 1:00 pm – 2:30 pm Princess Party Join us for a magical afternoon where every little girl's fairy tale dreams may come true! We will play dress up, have crown and tote bag decorating, nail painting by the FUN beauty squad, and a magical ice cream sundae bar! $30.00 per child. Reservations required, call the Kierland Minning Company 480-624-1268. iCal Send Princess Party to Google Calendar Princess Party
